_description: Cycle time estimation models based on Boothroyd DFM methodology
_reference: Boothroyd, G. et al. (2011) Product Design for Manufacture and Assembly

tolerance_factor.description: Cycle time multiplier = max(1.0, reference_tolerance / actual_tolerance)

surface_finish_factor.description: Cycle time multiplier = max(1.0, reference_ra / required_ra)
